data.name: m_btnBack.HelpString
data.value: Takes you back to the previous step.

data.name: m_btnCancel.HelpString
data.value: Closes this wizard without saving any changes you have made.

data.name: m_btnNext.HelpString
data.value: Takes you to the next step (Next) or saves settings and exits the wizard (Finish).

data.name: m_btnHelp.HelpString
data.value: Displays more information to help you use this wizard.

data.name: lblIdentifyLanguage.Text
data.value: Identify the language associated with the new writing system

data.name: lblMoreInfoDesc.Text
data.value: If you need to distinguish this writing system from another for the same language, provide at least one Script, Region, or Variant name that is different. Select from the lists provided or enter a new item.

data.name: chkUsesIPA.HelpString
data.value: Helps you set up this writing system to use the International Phonetic Alphabet.

data.name: chkUsesIPA.Text
data.value: This writing system uses the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA).

data.name: lblRegionVariantInfoDesc.Text
data.value: FieldWorks can pre-select some settings for you if your writing system uses the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA).

data.name: m_ShortWsName.HelpString
data.value: Specifies an abbreviation to identify the writing system.. Editable.

data.name: lblWsAbbrevInstructions.Text
data.value: The abbreviation is used to identify the writing system in multilingual fields and in other places where a short name for the writing system is required.

data.name: label1.Text
data.value: Please press the help button for more information.

data.name: lblFontDesc.Text
data.value: Choose the default fonts to use for data in this writing system. It is fine to use the same font more than once.

data.name: radioRTL.HelpString
data.value: Specifies the direction in which the writing system is written.

data.name: radioLTR.HelpString
data.value: Specifies the direction in which the writing system is written.

data.name: lblDirectionDesc.Text
data.value: FieldWorks currently supports left-to-right and right-to-left writing systems. Please select the appropriate direction:

data.name: m_localeMenuButton.HelpString
data.value: Specifies a similar writing system in order to inherit sort order and keyboard properties.

data.name: lblSimilarWSDesc.Text
data.value: You can base the new writing system on a similar one, for example, the writing system of a national or regional language.

data.name: label2.Text
data.value: If you need to use Keyman, choose the Keyman keyboard in the lower list. In this case the choice in the upper list only affects what language will appear in the system Language Bar when you are using this writing system.

data.name: lblFinishOrBack.Text
data.value: Click Finish to complete setting up the new writing system, or Back if you need to alter any selections.

data.name: lblConverterDesc.Text
data.value: If you will be importing legacy (8-bit or MBCS) data into FieldWorks, select the appropriate encoding converter from the list below. You can register additional converters (and experiment to see which works) by clicking "More..."

data.name: btnEncodingConverterNew.HelpString
data.value: Opens a dialog box for adding, modifying, deleting, and testing encoding converters.

data.name: cbEncodingConverter.HelpString
data.value: Specifies the encoding converter for importing data which uses this writing system.

data.name: lblKeyboardDesc.Text
data.value: If you can use the keyboard of a standard system language, choose it in the first list and leave the Keyman keyboard "None."
